items.title: Texas floods leave at least 51 dead, 27 girls missing as rescuers search devastated landscape
items.description: The destructive fast-moving waters along the Guadalupe River rose 26 feet in just 45 minutes before dawn Friday, washing away homes and vehicles.

items.title: Texas summer camp hit by flood has been in the same clan for generations and has served the state’s top families
items.description: Relatives of prominent Texas politicians, including President Lyndon Johnson, have attended the camp over the years.

items.title: Secret Service in US expands a global push against crypto scams
items.description: The Secret Service's Global Investigative Operations Center has seized nearly $400 million in digital assets over the last decade.

items.title: Musk forms America Party ‘to give you back your freedom’ after reigniting bitter feud with Trump
items.description: "When it comes to bankrupting our country with waste & graft, we live in a one-party system, not a democracy," Musk said on X.

items.title: The world could get carved up into these 3 blocs as Trump tariffs fuel deglobalization. Here’s which side each country might join
items.description: Wells Fargo sketched out a hypothetical scenario where the world is divided into three trading blocs led by the U.S., China, and the EU.
